Title for settings section to enable different Siri Shortcuts.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to add the site to Shortcuts

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the find in page menu

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.
Title for the share menu where users can take actions for the current website they are on.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to remove the site from Shortcuts

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to reload the site as a mobile device

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the default browser.

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to share the current website they are on through another app.

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Przejdź do ustawień, by zarządzać konkretnymi opcjami prywatności i bezpieczeństwa.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Domyślne ustawienia zapewniają silną ochronę, ale łatwo można dostosować je do własnych potrzeb.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ uniemożliwił tej witrynie szpiegowanie Cię. Stuknij tarczę, by dowiedzieć się, co zablokowaliśmy.

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
